## IClear interface

Interface for mutable types supporting internal cleanup (e.g. removing all values in a container etc.).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IClear 
```

## Remarks

Also see [IEmpty](./api.iempty.md) and [IRelease](./api.irelease.md) for related operations.
